titleStmt.title: A new and further discovery of the Islle [sic] of Pines in a letter from Cornelius van Sloetton, a Dutch-man (who first discovered the same in the year 1667) to a friend of his in London : with a relation of his voyage to the East Indies : wherein is declared how he happened to come thither, the scituation of the country, the temperature of the climate, the manners and conditions of the people that inhabit it, their laws, ordinances, and ceremonies, their way of marrying, burying &c, the longitude and latitude of the island, the pleasantness and felicity thereof, with other matters of concern.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

titleStmt.title: A new and further discovery of the Islle [sic] of Pines in a letter from Cornelius van Sloetton, a Dutch-man (who first discovered the same in the year 1667) to a friend of his in London : with a relation of his voyage to the East Indies : wherein is declared how he happened to come thither, the scituation of the country, the temperature of the climate, the manners and conditions of the people that inhabit it, their laws, ordinances, and ceremonies, their way of marrying, burying &c, the longitude and latitude of the island, the pleasantness and felicity thereof, with other matters of concern.
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Allen Bankes and Charles Harper ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Neville by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Sloehon is a pseudonymn.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
